//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0

if(k>=h.length){
break;

java.log(strcom)

k++

java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){

original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item

{

	}
